properties.question: What is the most accurate method to calculate the annual growth rate of a child?
properties.option_a: By measuring the height increase over a year and dividing by the initial height
properties.option_b: By assessing the child's weight gain over a year and using standard growth charts
properties.option_c: By calculating the change in BMI over the year and applying a standard growth chart
properties.option_d: By measuring the increase in arm span over a year and comparing it to growth charts
